text: Stav Shaffir (; born 17 May 1985) is an Israeli politician. She is the leader of the Green Party, she was a member of the Knesset for the Democratic Union alliance. In December 2019, Shaffir announced that she would be renaming the Green Movement the Green Party, and would run independently in the 2020 elections. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Knesset Category:HaAvoda politicians Category:Israeli political leaders Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Jewish politicians
title: Stav Shaffir
